event.title: June 4, 1971 the Macon High School baseball team finished

data.event: On June 4, 1971 the Macon High School baseball team finished in second place at the Illinois High School Association championship tournament.
Their unlikely run to the state tournament was documented in Chris Ballard's 2012 book, "One Shot at Forever: A Small Town, an Unlikely Coach, and a Magical Baseball Season."

event.title: joined the Atlanta Braves as a player in 1977

data.event: Brian Snitker, a member of that team, joined the Atlanta Braves as a player in 1977, was their third base coach, and as of 2014 is the manager of Atlanta's Class AAA Gwinnett Braves.
